ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, this test seems to be the only one failing. It always does so, second build is no help. I wrote into the project.xml

Yes, this test seems to be the only one failing. It always does
so, second build is no help.

I wrote into the project.xml        
<exclude>**/*IdentityCachingMapTest.java</exclude>
(is this the right syntax?) and went further. 

Now the build creates binaries but then it stops with
a funny little error while creating documentation, please see below.

Thanks for help!

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:

> > [junit] [ERROR] TEST org.archive.util.IdentityCachingMapTest
FAILED
> 
> Is this the only test that fails?
> 
> Off-the-list, Mike Schwartz reports that retrying the build, the
test 
> passes second-time around.  Is this the case for you also?
> 
> This test is for a functionality we don't currently use.  If its
the 
> only test thats failing for you, I'll probably just comment it out
in 
> HEAD with a note the sporadic failing warrants further
investigation 
> should the functionality its testing ever be adopted.
